text:
## ‚úÖ Footer Multilingual Implementation Complete!

I've successfully implemented full multilingual support for the footer section. Here's what I accomplished:

### üéØ **Footer Translations Added**
- **About VisibleDx section** - Title, description, and badges (94% Sensitivity, Evidence-Based, Open Source)
- **Evidence Base section** - Title and all 6 clinical guidelines 
- **Important Notes section** - Title and all 6 safety/clinical notes
- **Bottom footer** - Version, copyright, audience label, and research badge
- **Technical disclaimer** - Full peer-review and validation text

### üåç **Languages Supported**
All footer content now available in **7 languages**:
- **English** - Complete with medical terminology
- **Dutch** - Professional healthcare translation
- **Danish** - Clinical terminology adapted
- **German** - Medical guidelines translated
- **Swedish** - Healthcare professional language
- **Norwegian** - Clinical context preserved
- **French** - Medical French with proper terminology

### üîß **Technical Implementation**
- **TypeScript types updated** - Added comprehensive `footer` interface
- **Component refactored** - All hardcoded English replaced with `t.footer.*` keys
- **Dynamic rendering** - Guidelines and notes lists now map through translation arrays
- **Build verified** - ‚úÖ Successful compilation with no errors

### üé® **User Experience**
- Footer now **automatically translates** when users switch languages
- **Consistent styling** maintained across all languages
- **Medical accuracy** preserved in all translations
- **Professional tone** appropriate for healthcare context

The footer is now fully integrated with the existing multilingual system and will translate seamlessly when users change their language preference!
